product_name: Laptop Screen Extender Monitor, 14" IPS Triple Portable Monitor for Laptop Extension, 1080P FHD Dual Monitor Screen for 13"-17.3" Laptops, Type-C/USB-A/HDMI Plug & Play for Wins/Mac/Chrome
short_description: Increase Work Efficiency up to 300% & Save Time : The laptop screen extender Full HD display lets you get more done at home or in the office with its thin bezel, vivid display, and all-purpose ports. IPS Panel & FHD 1920 x 1080P and more configurations: With 14” IPS, full HD 1920 x 1080 Pixels resolution,16:9 aspect ratio,300 nit brightness,60Hz refresh rate, 72% NTSC color gamu 1: 1000 contrast as well as the 16.7 Million display color, the laptop monitor delivers vibrant colors and a wide field of vision,you can immersive yourself in video editing,webcasting,app development,remote job,graphic design,etc. Wide Compatibility:Operating System: Windows, MacOS ( Excluded M1 / M2 / M3 chips ), Linxu, M1 Pro/Max, M2 Pro/Max, M3 Pro/Max, Chrome, Linxu, Android. Available devices: laptops, PS4, Xbox, Switch, Type-C phones. Fits laptops: from 13 inch to 17.3 inch. Wide range of uses and applications : Business trip,video conference,meeting,software programming,gaming, etc. Portable & Convenient : The folding characteristic makes it easy to carry for remote work or travels at anytime, anywhere. With its sleek design and simple tilt function, you can smoothly position this portable monitor to meet your mixed work needs.
